text: Palace Hotel, also known as M.S. Cowles & Co., American Clothing House, Ross Hotel, and J.C. Penney Co., is a historic hotel and commercial building located at Butler, Bates County, Missouri. It was built in 1879, and is a three-story, rectangular, Italianate style wood frame building faced in brick. It features a highly ornamented front facade, including elaborated window crowns in an inverted-U shape. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2002. ==References== Category:Hotel buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Commercial buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Italianate architecture in Missouri Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1879 Category:Buildings and structures in Bates County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Bates County, Missouri
title: Palace Hotel (Butler, Missouri)
